features: One 6 fl oz tube of vH essentials Tea Tree Oil & Prebiotic Daily Feminine Wash
This vaginal wash offers vH Microbalance Odor Blocking Blend in a tea tree oil cleanser
Intimate wash and feminine cleanser contains tea tree oil, prebiotics (fructo-oligosaccharides), lavender seed oil and cranberry to help soothe and support feminine care
Paraben free pH balanced feminine wash contains no artificial colors, artificial dyes or animal byproducts
Use this womens feminine wash as a gentle daily cleanser to help fight vaginal odor or as an all-over gentle body wash
body.description: Feel clean and confident with vH essentials Tea Tree Oil & Prebiotic Daily Intimate Feminine Wash. Fortified with a vH Microbalance Odor Blocking Blend, this feminine cleansing wash helps banish unwanted and unpleasant vaginal odor. Gently cleanse sensitive intimate areas with a mixture of tea tree oil, prebiotics (fructo-oligosaccharides), lactic acid, lavender seed oil and Chamomile flower extract. This paraben free feminine wash is cruelty-free and contains no artificial colors or dyes, or animal byproducts. Take control of your feminine hygiene with this gentle, daily vaginal wash.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: vH essentials Probiotics with Prebiotics and Cranberry Feminine Health Supplement - 60 Capsules Probiotics and Cranberry for women offers a natural way to boost both feminine tract and urinary tract healthOffered in 60 count and 120 count optionsContain probiotics, fructo-oligosaccharides (prebiotics), and natural cranberry powderProbiotics and prebiotics in cranberry capsules for broad microbial support, a natural way to bolster vaginal healthWhen taken as directed, may help reduce risk of recurrent urinary tract infections (UTI)Not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease vH essentials, Ph Balanced Daily Feminine Wash with Tea Tree & Prebiotic One 6 fl oz tube of vH essentials Tea Tree Oil & Prebiotic Daily Feminine WashThis vaginal wash offers vH Microbalance Odor Blocking Blend in a tea tree oil cleanserIntimate wash and feminine cleanser contains tea tree oil, prebiotics (fructo-oligosaccharides), lavender seed oil and cranberry to help soothe and support feminine careParaben free pH balanced feminine wash contains no artificial colors, artificial dyes or animal byproductsUse this womens feminine wash as a gentle daily cleanser to help fight vaginal odor or as an all-over gentle body washNow available in hypoallergenic! vH essentials Boric Acid + Tea Tree Vaginal Suppositories - 24 Count Our boric acid suppositories are infused with natural tea tree oil and lactic acid, to gently support intimate health by balancing vaginal pH levels and helping control odor.Easy and comfortable to insert with our reusable vaginal suppository applicator. It’s natural feminine care that really works.Relieve feminine issues with pure boric acid infused with tea tree oil, lactic acid and prebiotics. No fragrances, parabens or animal byproducts used ever!Restore your wellbeing and confidence. Bye-bye odor! Hello, a refreshed you! Insert daily at bedtime to feel clean and comfortable again. vH essentials Vaginal Odor Treatment, pH Balanced Vaginal Tablet - 6 Tablets One box of 6 vH essentials pH Balanced Vaginal Odor Suppositories With Vaginal ApplicatorFeminine odor care vaginal suppositories supercharged with ascorbic acidSupport vaginal health with a healthy pH balance, eliminate embarrassing feminine odor and reduce unpredictable feminine hygiene irregularities with vH essentials Odor Treatment tabletsFast-acting, no-mess, time-release feminine products help support a normal, healthy pH balance for women

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works almost immediately
reviews.reviewText: The size for one is surprisingly good and acceptable. As for the product itself, it has a little minty scent to it with a smooth texture. I really love love love this. It works RIGHT A WAY!! The very first day. Almost immediately. Geddit!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: super mild scent that feels very natural and is great for my sensitive skin. no irritation whatsoever, really easy to use and effective in controlling odor, balancing pH, and making you feel clean without being invasive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sensitive skin friendly
reviews.reviewText: I’m very skeptical when it comes on to vaginal products but I must say this product is very good. It’s great for sensitive skin and it can be used on a daily basis. Also it doesn’t contain any hash chemicals and it has a very mild scent great for that time of the month too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wash for women.
reviews.reviewText: I used more than 10 already, gentle, nature ingredients, natural smell, just need a little bit every time, last long time. Worth every penny. Really love it! Please never discontinue. And recommend this to every woman. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using it for over a month now and I really like it. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this yoni wash for 2 years now & won’t use any other! I love that it’s 100% natural & cruelty free (Yuka Approved). I’ve never been irritated and it always leaves me feeling & smelling fresh!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've never felt more clean!
reviews.reviewText: I feel so fresh and so clean after washing with this product. I use it once everyday when I shower. It doesn't cause dryness or irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Important hygiene item
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this wash. It is sooo gentle and gets the job done without heavy perfumes. Not my first time purchasing and will not be my last. Absolute gem and it's not overpriced. Definitely get you a few to add to your routine.
This wash is gentle, fragrance free and a small amount does the trick. Any unpleasant odor gone completely almost right away. Feel fresh all day! Will definitely buy again
Very refreshing and does the job cleaning private parts.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gentle and cleansing, no irritation exprienced
reviews.reviewText: Nothing to dislike about this product, it's very sizeable so I can use this for a long time. I did not feel any irritation and there was no fragrance which is awesome!
Clean scent, works well. I even use as a face wash as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: A life saver - can’t live without it now
reviews.reviewText: What a game changer. It’s super gentle and it makes my lady bits extremely soft. I am prone to many infections because of wanting to be too clean. This is just amazing. I use my dove sensitive skin soap first and finish with this product. I can’t not use it.
